flow.descriptionCdata:
aa248ad3-f9be-445b-ae9d-963ce128bebc.1a8a995d-516e-43d5-974e-51a9d34c1540.description=Counts from one number to another number. 
Inputs\:
from - The number to start counting at.
to - The number to count to.
incrementBy - The number to increment by while counting. If unspecified this is 1. If you wanted to count 2,4,6,8 this would be 2.
reset - If true, then the counter will restart counting from the beginning.

NOTE\: These values must be between -9223372036854775808 and 9223372036854775807

Returns\:
The number that was just counted.

Note\: the primary result is resultString, Result can also be used. result (All lower case) should not be used as it is the response code.

Responses\:
has more - Not yet done counting.
no more - Done counting. This will only be returned once, then counting restarts.
failure - Something went wrong.
aa248ad3-f9be-445b-ae9d-963ce128bebc.2ec426ca-e856-4b2f-9462-89290ca85556.prompt=User Identifier aa248ad3-f9be-445b-ae9d-963ce128bebc.4af9c92e-b3de-4c7b-a791-e719538bb837.description=This workflow updates the Process Instance State using PEM API. Inputs\: _PROCESS_INSTANCE_ID - Process Instance Id _processInstanceState - Process Instance State (Use value from selection list CSA-ProcessInstance-State) Result\: _processInstanceState -Updated Process Instance State aa248ad3-f9be-445b-ae9d-963ce128bebc.4dd77a3d-c22e-4088-a618-9150f825ded1.prompt=Enter a value for value2 aa248ad3-f9be-445b-ae9d-963ce128bebc.4fd8d8bd-76a9-4178-a553-5fcc994e83cf.prompt=Artifact ID aa248ad3-f9be-445b-ae9d-963ce128bebc.52c922f1-9a43-4aa5-9f10-60e9b38ab00a.prompt=Enter a value for value1 aa248ad3-f9be-445b-ae9d-963ce128bebc.56656435-7522-499f-820f-d7f7dfc0ab1c.prompt=User Identifier aa248ad3-f9be-445b-ae9d-963ce128bebc.573bb4da-9184-4589-87e9-f4e9da63b973.prompt=Resource Provider ID aa248ad3-f9be-445b-ae9d-963ce128bebc.619fb374-ff87-4686-9414-f4eab9b4a334.description=
Checks if a number or word is greater than another number or word. Word comparison is case-sensitive in alphabetical order.

Inputs\:
value1 - The first value.
value2 - The second value.

Returns\:
value1 > value2

Responses\:
success - The boolean operation was evaluated to true.
failure - Something went wrong or the boolean operation returned false.
aa248ad3-f9be-445b-ae9d-963ce128bebc.6b5843ac-f8f9-46d0-b529-0a222c02d20c.prompt=Enter a value for serviceInstanceId aa248ad3-f9be-445b-ae9d-963ce128bebc.70354482-fa82-48bd-a279-299e0c0a33e1.prompt=User Identifier aa248ad3-f9be-445b-ae9d-963ce128bebc.716ab745-3e7f-4528-b7cd-58f852471e6a.description=This workflow updates the Process Instance State using PEM API. Inputs\: _PROCESS_INSTANCE_ID - Process Instance Id _processInstanceState - Process Instance State (Use value from selection list CSA-ProcessInstance-State) Result\: _processInstanceState -Updated Process Instance State aa248ad3-f9be-445b-ae9d-963ce128bebc.7fb68f2d-48fc-4eac-8a5e-8f98ea4f4f01.description=
Subtracts two numbers

Inputs\:
value1 - The first value.
value2 - The second value.

Returns\:
The difference of the two numbers.

Responses\:
success - The operation completed successfully.
failure - Something went wrong.
aa248ad3-f9be-445b-ae9d-963ce128bebc.81f67c46-cb51-47cc-ae77-0449533354f7.description=
Subtracts two numbers

Inputs\:
value1 - The first value.
value2 - The second value.

Returns\:
The difference of the two numbers.

Responses\:
success - The operation completed successfully.
failure - Something went wrong.
aa248ad3-f9be-445b-ae9d-963ce128bebc.92f438d8-e0a7-4747-b306-b620c75938ac.prompt=Process Instance ID aa248ad3-f9be-445b-ae9d-963ce128bebc.98bb767d-4cc0-4969-9ac0-2552f7dab07b.prompt=User Identifier aa248ad3-f9be-445b-ae9d-963ce128bebc.add67905-0c58-442d-a906-343a4ffeaae1.description=
Remove a Server from the Server Group. Random Server will be selected from the Server Group.

Inputs Parameters\:

 CSA_CONTEXT_ID – CSA Context Id
 CSA_PROCESS_ID – CSA Process Instance Id
 SVC_COMPONENT_ID - This token will resolve to the Service component Id. Default value for this token is [TOKEN\:SVC_COMPONENT_ID]
 RSC_PROVIDER_ID - This token will resolve to the Resource Provider Id that was selected at the Subscription time. Default value for this token is [TOKEN\:RSC_PROVIDER_ID]
 SVC_SUBSCRIPTION_EMAIL - This token will resolve to the subscriber’s email address. Default value for this token is [TOKEN\: SVC_SUBSCRIPTION_EMAIL]
 RSC_SUBSCRIPTION_ID - This token will resolve to the Resource Subscription Id that was created from the Resource Offering at the Subscription time.
  		Default value for this token is [TOKEN\: RSC_SUBSCRIPTION_ID]
 SVC_COMPONENT_TYPE - This token will resolve to the Service component type. Eg\: Server.. Default value for this token is [TOKEN\: SVC_COMPONENT_TYPE]
 RSC_POOL_ID - This token will resolve to the Resource pool Id that was selected at the Subscription time. Default value for this token is [TOKEN\: RSC_POOL_ID]
 SVC_INSTANCE_ID - This token will resolve to the Service Instance Id. Default value for this token is [TOKEN\: SVC_INSTANCE_ID]
 SVC_SUBSCRIPTION_ID - This token will resolve to the Subscription Id that was created at the Subscription time. Default value for this token is [TOKEN\: SVC_SUBSCRIPTION_ID]
 PRN_COMPONENT_ID – This token will resolve to the parent Component’s Service Component Id. Default value for this token is [TOKEN\: PRN_COMPONENT_ID]
 REQ_ORG_ID - This token will resolve to the Organization Id associated with the service request. Default value for this token is [TOKEN\: REQ_ORG_ID]
 REQ_USER_ID - This token will resolve to the User Id associated with the service request. Default value for this token is [TOKEN\: REQ_USER_ID]
 USR_ORG_ID - This token will resolve to the Organization Id associated with the subscriber. Default value for this token is [TOKEN\: USR_ORG_ID]
 RSC_BINDING_ID - This token will resolve to the Resource Binding Id that was created at the Subscription time. Default value for this token is [TOKEN\: RSC_BINDING_ID]

Responses\:
 success - The operation completed successfully.
 failure - Something went wrong.
aa248ad3-f9be-445b-ae9d-963ce128bebc.b1474099-6f42-4bd2-a6ee-423a5ab697a6.prompt=Process Instance ID aa248ad3-f9be-445b-ae9d-963ce128bebc.b14d1336-b887-4387-8e4d-ad1bf90349c0.description=This workflow returns the component properties and values using Artifact APIs. result\: propertyNameValuesList\: pipe separated list of property name and values ( where each property name and values would be ; seprated and multiple values would be , seprated) e.g. - property 1; value1,value2|property 2; value3|property 3; value3,value4|........ aa248ad3-f9be-445b-ae9d-963ce128bebc.d3b7f405-df8f-4630-9968-683671117fab.prompt=Number to count to. aa248ad3-f9be-445b-ae9d-963ce128bebc.d63c261c-3c42-4a81-99b3-0552fb6b7a5c.prompt=Enter a value for value1 aa248ad3-f9be-445b-ae9d-963ce128bebc.db7954b4-a908-436f-ad04-f4cb051e6fb4.prompt=Enter a value for processInstanceId aa248ad3-f9be-445b-ae9d-963ce128bebc.description=
This flow will flex up or flex down the cpu and memory configuration of all the servers in a server group. 

The flex up and flex down operations will execute whether the server is running, suspended or in switched off state.
If the flex up or flex down operation fails for one server, the action will continue on the remaining servers in the server group.
The maximum number that can be given as input for a flex up operation depends on the underlying configured vCenter.

Inputs\:
CSA_CONTEXT_ID 	\: CSA Context Id
CSA_PROCESS_ID 	\: CSA Process Instance Id
SVC_COMPONENT_ID 	\: This token will resolve to the Service component Id. Default value for this token is [TOKEN\:SVC_COMPONENT_ID]
RSC_PROVIDER_ID 	\: This token will resolve to the Resource Provider Id that was selected at the Subscription time. Default value for this token is [TOKEN\:RSC_PROVIDER_ID]
SVC_SUBSCRIPTION_EMAIL \: This token will resolve to the subscriber’s email address. Default value for this token is [TOKEN\: SVC_SUBSCRIPTION_EMAIL]
RSC_SUBSCRIPTION_ID 	\: This token will resolve to the Resource Subscription Id that was created from the Resource Offering at the Subscription time. Default value for this token is [TOKEN\: RSC_SUBSCRIPTION_ID]
SVC_COMPONENT_TYPE 	\: This token will resolve to the Service component type. Eg\: Server.. Default value for this token is [TOKEN\: SVC_COMPONENT_TYPE]
RSC_POOL_ID 	\: This token will resolve to the Resource pool Id that was selected at the Subscription time. Default value for this token is [TOKEN\: RSC_POOL_ID]
SVC_INSTANCE_ID 	\: This token will resolve to the Service Instance Id. Default value for this token is [TOKEN\: SVC_INSTANCE_ID]
SVC_SUBSCRIPTION_ID 	\: This token will resolve to the Subscription Id that was created at the Subscription time. Default value for this token is [TOKEN\: SVC_SUBSCRIPTION_ID]
PRN_COMPONENT_ID 	\: This token will resolve to the parent Component’s Service Component Id. Default value for this token is [TOKEN\: PRN_COMPONENT_ID]
REQ_ORG_ID 	\: This token will resolve to the Organization Id associated with the service request. Default value for this token is [TOKEN\: REQ_ORG_ID]
REQ_USER_ID 	\: This token will resolve to the User Id associated with the service request. Default value for this token is [TOKEN\: REQ_USER_ID]
USR_ORG_ID 	\: This token will resolve to the Organization Id associated with the subscriber. Default value for this token is [TOKEN\: USR_ORG_ID]
RSC_BINDING_ID 	\: This token will resolve to the Resource Binding Id that was created at the Subscription time. Default value for this token is [TOKEN\: RSC_BINDING_ID]

These tokens with the default values are resolved by CSA when the flow is invoked.

Responses\:
success		\: The flex up/flex down operation succeeded on all servers of the server group
failure		\: The flex up/flex down operation may have failed on one or more servers of the server group
aa248ad3-f9be-445b-ae9d-963ce128bebc.eef276a2-698d-4316-a7b4-4c98f2ccdbf6.prompt=Enter a value for value1 aa248ad3-f9be-445b-ae9d-963ce128bebc.f52e7092-1165-4a84-bb8a-ebefc298e777.description=
Checks if a number or word is not equal to another number or word. Word comparison is case-sensitive in alphabetical order.

Inputs\:
value1 - The first value.
value2 - The second value.

Returns\:
value1 \!\= value2

Responses\:
success - The boolean operation was evaluated to true.
failure - Something went wrong or the boolean operation returned false.
flow.name: Azure- Server Group Flexing
